lessons.title: Design Respectable-Looking Websites
lessons.desc:
These days, you need a good-looking website before anyone takes you seriously. It's a challenge many young designs and developers face.

In the course, we'll teach you rules (like typography, grids, colors etc) that experienced designers use on a daily basis so you can produce respectable designs that nobody can refute without spending $20,000 on another design course.

lessons.title: Build Amazing Web Experiences
lessons.desc:
Wondered if you can do any of these?

  • Add a video that plays automatically in the background
  • Make a website look great on mobile, laptop and all your devices
  • Add an item into a shopping cart when a visitor clicks on it, and see that little cart icon turn green

These are doable as long as you have sufficient skills in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. By the end of the course, you'll be able to build anything you (or others) think of. No more feeling stuck about the things you can't do for a website.

lessons.title: Backend Web Development
lessons.desc: Discover what goes on beyond Frontend Web Development. You'll learn to build membership portals, get data from twitter and more.

lessons.title: Project Management
lessons.desc: Gain the know-how of designing and developing minimum viable products through both short-term and real-life projects.

lessons.title: Working with Teams
lessons.desc: Find out how developers collaborate and how they can work from anywhere in the world.
